description: Kostas is an all-powerful tycoon, in love with his beautiful wife, Iro, who, however, is cheating on him with a young playboy, Nikos.
The wife of the North Kenya District Commissioner joins him in Africa and encounters trouble with the natives.
Anita Linda loves and is betrothed the Efren Reyes loves Anita but Patria Plata falls in love with Efren what a romance.
A disillusioned Wehrmacht officer named Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg and his co-conspirators attempt to assassinate Adolf Hitler on 20 July 1944.
Sam and Gaby, 2 medical interns, are asked to investigate patient Sarah in a criminal case. But as they search for the truth, they witness unexplained events.
After getting his visa to Germany denied, a man tries to marry British woman so he can move to England.
Delshawn, "The Chosen One", is back in action, but this time, it's not for destiny. Not for revenge. Not for justice. ...For answers.
Officer Kannan leads a group of police officers to track down the bandit, Veerappan.

A French girl named Nathalie inherits an almost uninhabited island called "Xavana" off the coast of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. She and some friends board a yacht, and travel there to explore and have fun in the sun.

movie_name: Baba Yaga: Terror of the Dark Forest
description: When Egor's mom dies, he gets a stepmom and then a baby half sister. Things get seriously twisted when his dad gets a hot nanny, who's the witch, Baba Yaga.
A group of individuals come together during the virus lock down. They tell their stories of love, hate, greed and death.
Melanie's suspicion is proven correct when her husband's identical twin is living with her pretending to be her husband, endangering their lives with his sinister plans.

Ezequiel, a former professional car racer, returns to his hometown after 15 years to compete in his last race. He finds Stela, an old affair; Angelo, the family patriarch, as well as Pedro, a 16 year-old boy who dreams of being a driver.
A girl has a nightmare and decides to explore the secret of her dead mother.
A young boy befriends an orphaned cub and raises him to adult-bearhood. This fine family feature. based on Walt Morey's novel "Gentle Ben," was the basis for the "Gentle Ben" television series.
Romantic comedy starring Anita Yuen and Lau Ching Wan, who are involved in a triangle relationship with Ada Choi.
An aging caretaker for a powerful vampire must help hunt down a rogue half-breed vampire at the same time that he trains his two new apprentices.

An astronaut from an indefinite future fall in love with a girl in present time each other. When his i love is threatened by an existential element, responsibility falls on him to save her, using his future knowledge as an edge ahead.
A medical horror of corrupt gynecologists and true events from Croatian hospitals that will shock the public.
The most pristine undetectable hundred dollar bill ever made, an unknown failed artist looking to get out of the business for good, and an ambition secret service agent walk into a bar..
Against the backdrop of Napoleon's Waterloo campaign, an ambitious woman from a family of entertainers begins a destructive climb up the social ladder.
Amir and his friends robbed a bank, but he had another plan, he chose to escape with the money to a village in the desert where he got to cope with a gang controlling the village.

A cult erotic drama from the perverse imagination of Alain Robbe-Grillet, SUCCESSIVE SLIDINGS OF PLEASURE delves into the twisted mind of a young woman suspected in the stabbing death of her roommate Nora.
Four teens summon forth a diminuitive, demonic minion from The Other Side to do their bidding and grant their wishes, but of course, they must all ultimately pay the price...

After getting fired from a children's toy company, an overworked marketing executive teams up with her bohemian sex-shop-owner neighbor to create better toys of a different kind, reigniting her stilted marriage in the process.
THE SERPENT-HAIRED VIXEN SOWS FEAR AND TERROR AMONG THE TOWNSPEOPLE AND CITE DWELLERS ALIKE.

movie_name: The Life and Loves of Mozart
description: Explores the mental state of Mozart during production of his final opera "Die Zauberflöte".
Four slackers decide to avenge their humiliation at the hands of a con-man.
A dark comedy, set during the second World War in Germany. Mentally retarded 16 year old boy manages to calculate the exact focus of miniature rockets and mercilessly kills people he does not like.
The Sikand family learns they are part of an ancient bloodline and the only hope at continuing is their gay daughter Savarna.
A boxer saves a girl from a noble kidnapper.
Scorching hatred seething fury EXPLODE to gunfight at Hawk's lair.
A young man whose father is killed takes to violence.
Coming face-to-face after being estranged for over a decade, divorced couple, Idris and Patricia, opt to revisit the past and traverse that treacherous path together, emerging open to new beginnings.
24 year old Polly Marie Davis spent 186 days in the clutches of a madman. Her body was battered and broken but her will to survive never wavered.
A reclusive screenwriter takes in a mysterious drifter who is determined to repay his kindness by helping him finish his latest story.

A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.
The police step in when the race to grab a share of the inheritance between the rushing son, the lawyer's assistant and the relatives causes mysterious deaths.

Cecil Stevens' name reveals his lisp so he changes it to "Michael Jordan." His whole school learns a lesson about acceptance after he and his friends start a business with the corrupt principal that sells celebrity names to kids.
This is the story of a young, immigrant couple, whose love is tested by real life struggles and challenges on a foreign soil.

Freddy is going on one last camping trip with his closest classmates. Before the trip, he finds a box with letters that claim to tell the future. The message is clear: One of his friends is going to kill him.
An elite superhuman agent must stop a foreign military unit from seizing control of an ancient artifact that holds the key to ultimate power.
A gang war takes place between two rivals - Shiva and Parshuram. ACP Khurana is appointed to bring the city back to normal. But when Shiva plans to kill him, destiny has something different for him.
A man goes through all kinds of action to impress the girl he is in love with a hope to marry her.
An average soldier is caught up in the cogs of an inhuman war machine during the First World War...
The Armed Detective Agency investigates a bizarre series of suicides involving an eerie mist.

When wealthy treasure hunter Cara Loft meets reclusive art collector, Dr. Scrotus, the sexy adventurer is thrust head on into the greatest and most dangerous erotic adventure of her life: the search for the three sacred "wombs."

Detective Broadly, who lost his faith many years ago, is called to investigate the disappearance of a church's collection plate. When a churchgoer admits to stealing the funds, the confession resurrects Broadly's views on God.
An affluent Mexican performer is troubled when her son announces his intentions to marry a Black American woman, and her daughter exhibits erratic behavior.
Harry Flakers is a pools winner who is targeted by a forger.

Sent on a trip from California to New Zealand to visit with his eccentric grandfather, Lonny discovers that his grandpa is a vampire. Unnerved at first, he soon discovers that his grandpa is a good vampire.

The heroes pose as gun dealers and acrobats in order to get close to the bad guys so they can avenge the death of one of their brothers. In the end they lock the bad guys in a warehouse for a final battle to the death.
A young man, Guy, discovers the woman he's been sleeping with is not only married, but married to Burt Walker, a notorious low-level crime boss.
A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.
Comic mis-adventures ensue when an English music journalist and her science fiction writing neighbor go searching Hollywood for an LA based musician named Henry Wolfe.
A young woman goes on a solo vacation to the English countryside following the death of her ex-husband.

After an artist is threatened by the yakuza into creating valuable but highly illegal pornography, the law aims to execute him. Zatoichi, having been honor bound to protect the man and his family, must now run against the law.

Follows Fernando, a priest accused of murder, as he encounters with Ruth, the woman who falls in love with him, and the real crime plot unravels after several intimate rendezvous over a number of years.
Three cousins travel to the village where they spent summer vacations as kids.
After his wife's death, Matt sets out on the journey across California to bury pieces of her jewelry in the places she wanted to visit.

Five people, unaware of the true identities of eac other, bind together to rob a villa on Mt Fuji of thousands of dollars worth of diamonds. However, they are betrayed by one of their members and learn that the target was never diamonds, but a North Korean microfilm

Hanuman, under the advice of Vaayu proceeds to the earth to help the chosen savior Kabir from the evil forces of Rock Shah. He along with Maya finally puts an end to Rock Shahs wicked ambitions to dust and help Kabir save the world
A spinster sends her sister's photograph to a soldier, whose friend poses as him.

Private detective Sam Ruben's clever plan falls apart with the onset of amnesia. Everyone is trying to kill him and he doesn't know why. The classic film noir milieu now comes to you in the form of an animated feature.

movie_name: The Diary of an Innocent Boy
description: Young innocent aristocrat Benjamin comes to live with his Countess aunt. Her lover teaches him the techniques of seduction and sends him to test them, first on the maids, then on the upper class Anne and finally on the countess herself.
Three women revisit their memories and within the realms of this place, ruled by their past anguish, they catch a glimpse of possible reactions they could have had when under oppression.
Actor Eric Roberts stops an interview to recount a horrific nightmare he'd experienced earlier in the day. We enter the nightmare.

Nick is a student who moves to a new place to study for his exams. Unfortunately his roommates give him hell but he always manages to forgive them after a visit from Jesus Christ, Virgin Mary and God in his sleep..Until one day he snaps.
Two brothers go on a summer vacation to visit their mother in Saint-Jean-de-Luz. The plan was to go alone on a brothers' road trip across France, but a charming young woman crosses their path.

movie_name: Death, Deceit & Destiny Aboard the Orient Express
description: On New Year's Eve, jaded action movie star Jack Chase is traveling on the Orient Express with the rich and famous. Terrorist leader Tarik and his gang take over the train forcing Chase to become the hero he always just pretended to be.
Three small time criminal brothers plan a final heist before they are too old to do so.

The police are pursuing a man wanted for murder. If the man is arrested his daughter will be placed in foster care. To stay free they escape into the wilderness. Faro refers to a Portuguese city that the father once visited.

Ace (Motorhead's Lemmy Kilmister) is the head of the Sunset Society - a secret vampire organization that hosts the best parties in Hollywood. Even as the blood flows freely, the club will do anything to keep their existence a secret.
An Air Force captain is assigned to find some missing top-secret microfilm.
A couple are given a camera and a set of instructions which they must follow or else someone will die.
During the broadcast of a live game show, a surprise guest is shot by an armed assassin.The victim, Martin Gaillard, recounts the bizarre series of events that led to this extraordinary denouement.

Zian Servettaz is a dedicated mountain man. His Italian-born wife Bianca does not adjust well to his mountain village in France, and to the ever life-threatening dangers presented by his mountain guiding and climbing.
In the last days before Armaggeddon, three men must make one eternal choice: receive the mark of the devil or stand for Christ. This movie will make you think about your own life choices.

Newly arrived in a Western city, Kansan Gloria Dell waits at the train station to meet Larry Goodrich, the fiance' she has corresponded with, but never met. When he doesn't arrive, Mrs. ...                See full synopsis »
The last days of legendary opera singer Maria Callas.
Two independent ego-centric couple, Vidya and Vasu. Their love journey begins after the wedding, arranged by their parents. But when Ego is more important than a relationship, it's hard to sail.
Former special ops soldier, Laura Bishop, shows up for work at the largest church in America and is forced to take down a team of hijackers when she learns her daughter is trapped inside.

movie_name: The Count of the Old Town
description: In one of the narrow streets of the Old town of Stockholm lies hotel City. It's inhabited by mysterious characters such as 'Greven', 'Blomman' and others. The police inspector Göransson is chasing a jewel thief, 'Diamond-Lasse'.

Teddy, a young writer, ventures to an isolated desert house to complete his first novel, where he meets and seduces the mysterious caretaker, Leo. Layers of memory and hallucination unfold that intertwine the two men.

Two men in a deserted area without knowing how they got there, are trying to escape from an unknown force that pursues them. They soon discover that a secret government experiment is responsible for their situation.
A framed prison escapee unknowingly kidnaps a female cop en-route to a rendezvous with the corrupt cop who put him behind bars.
Ida and Albin are a happy couple. They set off to a cabin in the vast Swedish woodlands to have a fun holiday with their friends. But under the floorboards waits an evil from Sweden's dark past.
When Canyon discovers a mysterious device in the desert, he activates it, uncovering its secrets and the dangers that are brought with it.
Older is a drama/romance about sex, love, relationships, growing up and how our nostalgic attachment to the past can colour our perception of the present, sometimes for the worse.
An aerospace engineer (Ladd) ignores a policeman (Steiger) and hunts down a gang of juvenile delinquents.

Nathan and Salma enter the world of social activism. Salma chooses to express himself digitally while Nathan chooses to take to the streets. This difference sparked a big fight when Nathan is involved in a big riot at a demonstration.

Ped loses his girlfriend and is heartbroken. He begins a new job and meets Oiy who confesses his love to him. Oiy is a male co-worker and Ped rejects him, not being gay. As time goes by a reluctant affection toward Oiy slowly develops.
Two strangers share a sweepstakes ticket and then embark on an "imaginary" honeymoon with their "winnings".
An intense thriller about a lonely bookseller's obsessive love affair, and her protective best friend, who alone knows the horrible truth about her obsession.
Two spirits link the lives of dozens of residents of San Francisco's Japantown as told through a series of six interwoven vignettes.

A gang leader dumps her criminal boyfriend when he is convicted of robbery, but he recovers the stolen loot once he's released. In retaliation, the gang kidnaps his son and demands the money as ransom.
A taxi driver finds out the woman in the back of his cab is out for revenge against the man that abused her as a child: him.
The life of air pioneer Amelia Earhart is here given a fictionalized treatment, with a speculative conclusion.
The tale centers on an eccentric bag lady who rescues the stray cats of Venice and puts them on a boat to set sail for the New World.
A young boy named Honza is a bad student, but becomes a promising golfer and experiences the sweet life in the spotlight. But he almost loses not only his girl but also himself in the process.
A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.
The misadventures of two bumbling cops. Featuring a cast of colorful characters each with their own agenda.
A trio of nomadic cannibals face the wrath of Lloyd, who is seeking revenge for the death of his friend at their hands.

After inventing an anti-gravity device, scientist Thomas Edmonds and his daughter Mary attend the National Air Races in Cleveland, Ohio in search of a pilot to demonstrate the device and Bob Raymond, from the U.S. Border Patrol, is chosen.
A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.
With her husband away to fight in World War II, a housewife must care for their two daughters alone.

movie_name: O Capitão Bandeira Contra o Dr. Moura Brasil
description: Successful manager is haunted by a sinister character who enters his dreams, Dr. Moura Brasil.
A young woman on the run is determined to make the world a better place - even if it kills her.
A 10-year-old boy goes on a search for God after his grandfather dies.
Group of young rock boys need money for their performing. Soo, they decide to rob big drug boss. Czech comedy.
Krack is an action film which follows Veera Shankar, a hot headed police sergeant, who forms a vicious rivalry with notorious crime figure, Katari Krishna.

A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.
The story of Nick Leeson, an ambitious investment broker who singlehandedly bankrupted one of the oldest and most important banks in Britain.
A potter's confession to killing his brother gets turned into a vase beneath which it was hidden.
David Shields decides to become a ship designer instead of following the family tradition and entering farming.
Hamid, a rich car salesman from Kabul is plagued by nightmares. Are these just figments of his imagination or is he hiding some dark secrets from his past? Secrets clawing to get out...
Idiosyncratic new recruit Francis "Ike" Farrell tries to help the Cubs to the pennant with his pitching and hitting.
An anthology film / black comedy about three ordinary men who become involved in violent crimes.

A broadcaster of live horror themed streams receives a video which contains a female high school student disappearing right after she was calling a ghost while playing hide and (go) seek alone. He then goes to investigate.
Buddy cops Porky and Big Mouth are promoted to the anti-prostitution division after solving a robbery case.

Three children accidentally get turned into fish after drinking a potion made by an eccentric scientist. When the kids end up in the sea, they must find the antidote within 48 hours or remain as fish forever.
After losing his innocence, his best friend, and the love of his adolescence, this coming-of-age gangster drama follows Harman in an hour of his night within a new life of violence.

After a failed mission mercenary known as 'The Executioner', is forced to take one more case when his sister is kidnapped and raped as an attempt to get to him. He then wages a one-man war against the mob with his execution style.

In a small canal town, a rapist lurks in the shadows. A schoolgirl, a young woman and a young couple, all seem unable to cope with both the visible and the hidden dangers they all face from their morally corrupted compatriots.
The love story of the year; the love team of all time.
A journey to the darkest corners of the human mind.

movie_name: Bed & Breakfast: Love is a Happy Accident
description: Jake's as good as divorced. He opens a B&B in the California wine district. Meanwhile, hardworking, cute, unwed Ana in Rio inherits debt and that property and must sell so she travels to the B&B.

movie_name: Faut pas prendre les enfants du bon Dieu pour des canards sauvages
description: Rita will play her relationships, especially in love, among the crooks to get her share of gold bars.
In the 1930s, a farmer's wife in a small town is murdered. Suspicion falls on a Polish labourer and a posse is formed to catch him.
Upon reuniting with his friend Gage, a disengaged man named Owen is set on a deadly path to gain control of his own life. Can he survive?

A family is terrorized by a Christmas demon, Jack Frost, and must learn their family's dark secrets that link to why they are cursed. This Christmas, Jack will stop at nothing to exact his vengeance on those left in the bloodline.

When Mi-kyeong's father returns from Singapore, he forbids her engagement to Jun-ho because the latter is the son of his old rival, Park Jeong-tae. He and Jeong-tae had competed decades ago for the love of Mi-kyeong's mother.
A Navy veteran purchases a government surplus vessel and becomes involved in the capture of waterfront racketeers.
Biopic of Hudson Taylor (1832-1905), a British protestant missionary in China.
La vida de una mujer cambia totalmente tras el asesinato de su madre y al llegar a vivir con una tía se da cuenta que guarda un secreto que ha permanecido oculto y resguardado por siglos.

movie_name: Those Who Kill: Shadow of the Past
description: A forensic psychiatrist decides to change work. Days before leaving, a case of 5 shot on a Copenhagen city bus might involve an old patient of his. Other murders follow. He can't stop before the case is solved.
After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins - a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.
Kidnapping and marital reconciliation drive this action film set on a millionaire's private train.
An inconspicuous policeman is send to solve a murder case.
The editor of an exploitation newspaper commits a murder and assigns his protégé to investigate hoping to divert attention away from himself.

A desperate American couple discovers all is not what it seems when they uncover a high-stakes underground scam while traveling abroad. To expose the truth and get back to the U.S., they must risk their lives to save their daughter.
In this holiday romantic comedy, a mysterious woman who works at the post office answering Santa's mail captures the heart of a disillusioned postal carrier
A space freighter that has gone adrift suddenly catapults into an alternate universe.
The tables turn when a dead child who was always bullied by his big brothers, supernaturally gets another opportunity to walk the earth as an avenging spirit and pays back a favor.
Vampire hunter Van Helsing returns to Transylvania to destroy handsome bloodsucker Baron Meinster, who has designs on beautiful young schoolteacher Marianne.

Mike and his friends make plans for a mountain vacation. Near where they're camping is a girls' school where men are strictly forbidden. But when Mike falls in love with a student, he manages to get into school as a music teacher.
Tony "Untouchable" Martone leads the mafia in East Providence, RI until a rival family (Amato) attempts to take control of their territory.
When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.
A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I, and struggles with his pacifist inclinations before becoming one of the most celebrated war heroes.

Nader has lost his memory in an accident. He manages to escape from hospital and finds Sepideh and falls in love. He later gets back his memory and returns to his home but there remembers Sepideh and returns to her to live together.
Fictionalized story of British aerospace engineers solving the problem of supersonic flight.
TWO WOMAN, FORMERLY THE BEST FOR BEAT OF FRIENDS, BECOMES THE WORST OF ENEMIES WHEN THEY FALL FOR THE SAME MAN -. ADULT ONLY
Heroic tale of a swashbuckler and his patriotic comrades who defend their nation against enemies both external and internal.
An ex-cop, now a private detective, takes on the search for the millions stolen by a drug lord.
Stranded after a car accident, a medical school student and her friends try to find shelter - only to cross paths with a deranged killer.

movie_name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run
description: After SpongeBob's beloved pet snail Gary is snail-napped, he and Patrick embark on an epic adventure to The Lost City of Atlantic City to bring Gary home.

A young man visits a bar and falls for the waitress whose family turns out to be tied to Italian mob. The head henchman doesn't like him, so things heat up, even though the don likes him. Then stolen diamonds enter the picture.
A black preacher awakens to black consciousness theology and embarks on a revolution to preach a gospel that appeals to the black struggle in Africa.
Stylish road movie in which a kidnapped youth becomes friends with his abductors.
Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.
A doctor works to cure patients suffering from crippling phobias by placing them inside his invention, which induces and controls hallucinations.
In the time of Ireland's Great Famine, an elderly gravedigger revisits a traumatic event through the decaying visions of his fragmented dreams.
An institutionalized young woman becomes terrorized by a ghost.
A spaceship carrying settlers to Mars is knocked off course, causing the consumption-obsessed passengers to consider their place in the universe.

movie_name: The Last Women of the Philippines
description: Two young sisters are shipwrecked on a deserted island with their teacher Ms. Muro.
Children who were held hostage in their elementary school tell stories of miraculous things, but many adults are skeptical that the Cokeville Miracle ever truly happened.
Genda is a street cop with a secret weapon: his toupée.
The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.
A freaky incident during a man's breakup party leads to an ultimate change in his life as uncalled situations pop up, eventually leading to a lot of frenzy.
When journalist Jack Carter is held prisoner by an oppressive government years after a divisive election, he recounts democracy's swan song to a young soldier.
A boy gets in trouble at school after going to extremes to stop a kiss from happening. Now he has to convince his principal of the 6th kiss theory while trying to plan out his own 6th kiss.
A drunken doctor with a hot temper and a violence-prone gangster with tuberculosis form a quicksilver bond.
In Edinburgh a foundry owner weds a German spy's widow who becomes a nurse.
Self-centered parents of the 50's targeted by drama in which teenagers panicking after burglary supposed to finance the run from the Third World War.
A closeted gay woman, Mercy (Emily Lape), meets an attractive, sexual and loving college student named Jesse (Alison Hixon) that challenges her to explore her own beliefs on sexuality and religion.
Disenchanted with the corruption of society, Jacob joins a monastery where his meditation practice ignites a spontaneous out-of-body experience.
A touching coming-of-age story that follows an engineering boy who falls in love with a girl. To have had you once in my life is already enough.
Based on the novel by best selling author, Jodi Ellen Malpas.

When Martin a brilliant but failing engineer creates an infinite power source that causes an oddball space alien to crash land on Earth, the two form a comedic alliance in their quest to get Bob home.
The rivalry between two brothers reaches a fever pitch during a charity swim competition.
Exploding Action. Spilling Laughter.

Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.
Five of the most tales by the master of the ghost story M.R. James dramatized for BBC Radio 4.
New magistrate cleans up a corrupt town in his own comic Samurai way.
As a vicious wild boar terrorizes the Australian outback, the husband of one of the victims is joined by a hunter and a farmer in a search for the beast.

movie_name: The Torture Chamber of Dr. Sadism
description: A Count executed for murdering twelve virgins in a bid for immortality returns to life, seeking revenge on the daughter of his intended thirteenth victim and the son of his prosecutor.
A star-pilot for hire and his trusty sidekick must come to the rescue of a princess and save Planet Druidia from the clutches of the evil Spaceballs.
The story about a prizefighter and a motorcycle daredevil that vie for the beautiful girl from the Carnival.

When four prostitutes are killed in Hong Kong, police begin to suspect that it is the work of a serial killer. An international force of seven policewomen are sent undercover in the hopes of trapping the killer
In the days leading up to the 1936 Olympics, the fate of high jumper Gretel Bergmann hangs in the balance as it is decided whether or not a Jewish athlete can be a part of the German Olympic team.
A group of medical students are attacked by an aggressive laboratory animal while competing in an after-hours role-playing game at their school.
On the Eastern Front in World War II, a German battalion fights Russian and Partisan soldiers.
In the 1990s, a group of high school students in a strict Catholic school navigate their way through everyday teen pressures. Watch Mudhal Nee Mudivum Nee, a ZEE5 Exclusive film.
The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.
A wealthy amnesiac begins to suspect that his devoted wife is not really his wife and that he is not the man people keep telling him he is.

When a murder remains unsolved, 3 boys suspect and harass a reclusive indigenous man. One boy decides to break the cycle to make amends, however the inertia of past actions bring multiple characters to a crossroad and thrilling climax.

La película retrata los últimos años de la vida de José María Morelos y Pavón (1812-1815), héroe mexicano quien tras burlar el cerco de sus enemigos, toma una de las ciudades más ...                See full synopsis »
A woman is raped in her apartment. José a neighboring journalist and his friend Sancho will try to help her by seeing that the police do not come to their aid and the authorities do not do their job.
Three generations grappling with a life-changing experience during one day of a vacation in Sintra, Portugal, a historic town known for its dense gardens and fairy-tale villas and palaces.
An ambitious young man loses his girlfriend to a rich guy. His Casanova friend hooks him up with another woman to help get over the breakup.
A cockney girl and her soccer team of thugs confront an Indian player who she had previouly had a fling with.
A billionaire offers $1,000,000 to a young married couple for one night with the wife.
A Coptic leper and his orphaned apprentice leave the confines of the leper colony for the first time and embark on a journey across Egypt to search for what is left of their families.

movie_name: Ich kenn' dich nicht und liebe dich
description: A composer, inspired by a magazine photo of a young woman, lands a job as a butler in her family's Riviera villa to find out more.
To satisfy his creditors, a witty actor reinvents himself as a satirical playwright, with uproarious, yet bittersweet, results.
A downtrodden photographer, haunted by the urban violence and decay around him, retreats into an inner world of dark fantasies.
Romeo is an unruly youth in his local village. He goes to London after seeing his dream girl on Facebook to win her heart.
While seeking answers regarding the death of the twin brother he never knew he had, a French cop and his sibling's fiancée find themselves pursued by corrupt FBI agents and the Russian mafia.

Three vicious criminals lead by Rico and his twisted girlfriend Germana evade capture by the law at every turn. A determined cop, Tony, tries to hunt down the masked maniacs after they murder his undercover policewoman girlfriend.
An upscale couple visit a villa owned by a woman named Rita for some rest and relaxation, but the husband and Rita have other plans.
Jan, a mysterious character haunted by a deep feeling of guilt, tries to get Violeta back, a youth love he lost 20 years ago, with a sickening plan.

While backpacking around America, two Aussie girls find themselves deep in turtle racing debt. They devise crafty schemes to earn money any way they can while unwittingly becoming tangled in a dark mystery surrounding their family's past.
A teenage boy, while his mother is severely ill and his brother is under his care, has a powerful dream of needing to hunt down a magical halo in order to reunite his family for the holidays.
A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.

Desperate for a measure of success, wannabe screenwriters Mickey Hansen and Ray Ferguson decide to fully explore the depths of murder and crime within their story only to discover their obsession with their work has made it all too real.
A couple marry in order to save the bride from her father's choice of groom, but they don't actually love each other. It's "make it work" time.
The Saken team and their allies must be willing to sacrifice everything in an attempt to defeat the powerful Korrag before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to reality as we know it.
This ethereal, three-hour biopic is the middle film in Hans-Jürgen Syberberg's "German Trilogy" on the mythological foundations of the Third Reich.

Period crime drama: The King in Rome sends an official to Naples to break up the Camorra, the powerful group running things behind the scenes, currently they are hunting the man who killed one of their members.

Greta, a mysterious woman with amnesia, is taken in by the wealthy Mr. and Mrs. von Ravensbruck. The three soon enter into a love triangle that turns deadly, as Greta's gruesome past is slowly revealed.
The widow of an executive tries to find her husband's murderer before she becomes the next victim.
In his first film, young Dr. Kildare helps a female ex-con find her child.
This spy thriller pits veteran-turned-artist, Daniel Cliff, against US intelligence, and secrets from his past lead to hellish journey of lies, betrayal, and government retribution.

The story of a man caught in a whirlpool of grief and rage over the murder of his wife, Prayer to a Vengeful God is contemporary revenge drama, presented in an austere visual style, completely without dialogue.
A slight preview of the palestinian case about a palestinian doctor who lives with his wife and Farahan, his son in Haifa while facing the israeli occupation.
Four women escape from a prison and wind up stranded in a swamp with a lecherous redneck after them. Meanwhile, an federal agent tracks a ring of heroin smugglers through the same swamp.
Two hard-living best friends and aficionados of illegal racing contests find their bond tested when one of them goes to trial for vehicular homicide.
Passionate cry of a child to change the present education system.
A series of mysterious events take place and upon investigation it is revealed that a revenge is been taken of The Murder which was committed many years ago in Federal B Area,Islamabad.
A new interpretation of the most known and beloved fairy tale of Hans Christian Andersen - "Snow Queen"
A doctor searches for the cure for nagana, the sleeping sickness caused by the tsetse fly.
Competitive ice skater Tonya Harding rises amongst the ranks at the U.S. Figure Skating Championships, but her future in the activity is thrown into doubt when her ex-husband intervenes.
Ranu, a shy accountant, suddenly discovers a completely opposite personality living in his head: 80's singer Gilles Gabriel.
Two strangers, fleeing failed relationships in other cities, meet on the streets of New York. As they connect over a single evening, their outlook on life and love is tested.
In Cornwall, a shipwrecked boy becomes a priest and loves a slum landlord's wife.

A chorus girl gets a ride from a rich shipowner's driver. By the time the gossip reaches the cash-strapped theater director, she's engaged to the shipowner. The just fired girl gets promoted to the lead. Other misunderstandings follow.
An absent minded professor invents a pen that will explode on the sound of bells, then leaves it in a taxi.
This is the short Pedro Costa made for the Jeonju Digital Project in 2007.
In New York's Bowery during the Gay Nineties, a saloon owner and a rebel share a rivalry.
Three men wake after a hard night of partying and find the body of dead woman in a bathtub. Cue a frantic race against time to identify the killer.
A fun-loving young woman is murdered after trading bedrooms with her wealthy friend. Her ghost seeks aid from Topper to find the murderer.
Gilbert Harding is interviewed by John Fitzgerald and tells how Scotland Yard tracks down lorry thieves who killed a night watchman. (Authentic hospital operation scenes)
When a cop is shot dead during a raid, and another is mistakenly shot for killing him, his fellow officer friend goes undercover on his own to bust up the criminal's operation.
Womanizer Owen Daniels has finally met his match...his dorky roommate, Kevin.

In a time of national emergency, the wife of the Captain of a French battleship finds that her former lover is now the her husband's first officer. Her attempts to sort out this situation get mixed in with shipwreck and court martial.

When high school senior Karma's estranged cult leader father traps her and her mother in a remote forest compound, she must survive a series of psychological trials meant to prepare her for a strange and deadly reincarnation ritual.

A gang of punks, led by a masquerader named Tarzan; terrorizing a small Mexican city, robbing banks, raping women, and killing people with cruelties. Two enforcers Marco and Javier fight this gang of punks.

During the final days of World War II, an Italian prisoner of war in Texas is left in the hands of the camp's commander, the only soldier remaining to guard the only prisoner until the arrival of a patrol force that may never come.
Viond, who is madly in love with Subiksha, is challenged by her that he fight and win Ashwin, a boxing champion. He accepts her challenge to not only prove his love but also settle an old score.
For the well-being of her children, a destitute widow is forced to marry a man she dislikes.
When grandfather Billie died, the only thing left to his grandsons, Josh and Conner, was the responsibility of taking care of Hilltop Cemetery for a few days. Could this be a few days of fun or ...

Three drifting souls meet by chance on an island in high summer and keep each other company. Facing their inner demons and a mysterious killer, can they truly redeem themselves through love and find the paradise in their hearts?
A comedy about two estranged sisters brought back into each other's lives by the impending death of their grandmother.
After surviving a vicious assault in the city, Betsy moves to the country in hopes of starting over, but as she begins to recover, something begins clawing its way into the moonlight.
Explores Manmohan Singh's tenure as the Prime Minister of India and the kind of control he had over the cabinet and the country.
The movie story is set against the backdrop of the National Highways leading to Bangalore.
In Paris a Count's enforced wife takes the blame when her ex-lover is killed by the diplomat she loves.

When nerdy but lovable Jeffrey sets out to cure cancer for a class project, he accidentally drinks a deadly chemical that turns him into a deranged killer. Soon, a bloody series of murder, revenge, and downright lunacy is set forth!

movie_name: Just Like Wine the Older the Better
description: A Father , Son and Good friend set out to bring the joy to Christmas, the best way they know how, and you get to experience the fun they go through to get there. You will laugh and cry with this film.

A French anthropologist specializing in nomadic groups moves to Los Angeles with his wife, and starts following a group of sinister street punks who seem to live and move around in a black van. But they aren't what they seem.
Based on Gô Nagai's manga, about mild-mannered teenager Akira Fudô, who merges with a demon to fight other demons.
A meteor falls on Earth and the pieces are scattered everywhere. And the future of humanity depends on a mute and paranoid scientist and a man who doesn't want to hear or understand anything.
The tragic death of a beautiful young girl starts a tense and atmospheric game of cat and mouse between hunter John Moon and the hardened backwater criminals out for his blood.
A WWII Drama about a German/Jewish industrialist who, in order to ensure his family's safe passage out of Germany, is forced to hand over his business to the Germans.

During WWII a group of Jewish children is sent to a castle outside Paris to hide there until things cool down, but it eventually becomes their new home. Later, children from the liberated concentration camps arrive there as well.
A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.
Twenty-four hours elapse on the stoop of a Hell's Kitchen tenement as a microcosm of the American melting pot interacts with each other during a summer heatwave.
1828 Russian-Persian war and the diplomatic activities of Russian writer Alexander Griboedov are at the center of this war epic.

Prema Geema Jaane Do is a soft romantic comedy. The movie is about the protagonist setting up a journey to a new place and meeting new people.Why he hates love and what is in his past forms the main crux of the story.

When Bea moves back to the country house where she was born, she finds her brother and sister sill living in abject poverty. She will discover that her two siblings share the same ambiguous inclinations and more than one secret.
A young newlywed woman discovers that her old flame has returned to Athens and finds herself grappling with uncertainty and endless what-ifs.

Two strangers experience a sudden death/re-birth that thrusts them into the most important relationship of their existence. Through their shattered new realities, they explore their psychological and emotional dilemmas for inner peace.
Shawn (Michael Masurkevitch) and Manny (Mandip Brar) are spending the weekend at Shawn's family cabin. However, as the past and present begin to overlap, Shawn descends into horrific madness.
An artificial intelligence escapes her spaceship to turn into a female ghost and challenges two blade runners to a galactic chase.
After discovering that an asteroid the size of a city is going to impact Earth in less than a month, India recruits a misfit team to save the country.
As a coincidence, Murat founds his ex-love Selma after several years in his town. He would like to make up and regain her trust and love. However Selma already have a different life style.
A magician seeks vengeance upon the man who paralyzed him and the illegitimate daughter he sired with the magician's wife.
After a war against an enemy from another world breaks out in the South Pacific, a group of freshly recruited U.S. Marines are sent to the front lines.

Five friends plan to venture out to the forest where people are afraid to go. Though the people in the locality and the family members object to go to this haunted place, they courageously get into the forest.

A lawyer's receptionist is keen on detective stories and crime films. Believing her boss has been killed, she reports it to the police, but once questioned she knows all the answers about his disappearance.
A soldier is stuck in a combat zone after stepping on a mine.
A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.
The story of a newspaper reporter who dared face an angry outlaw band.
On a getaway weekend in the Skagit Valley, four friends from Seattle drift into their own dark, dangerous alternate realities.
A psychiatrist returns from abroad to apply new theories in therapy, where meet a rich girl worked as a translator but diagnosed with theft disease, and go to Dr. Omar then they fall in a love story.
A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.
A man tries to bring together his girlfriends' parents, who have been estranged for fifteen years because of disagreements, misunderstandings, and pride.
A mother and her daughter travel to find meaning for their family.
An adaptation into film of the opera by Alexander Borodin of the same name, in turn based on the poem "The Lay of Igor's Host".
THIS ACTION FILM FEATURES THE LIFE STORY OF ANOTHER SMALL TOWN GUY WHOSE CAREER IN CRIME STARTED WITH SOME PETTY LAWLESSNESS.
The inspiring true story of Paul Holderfield, a bigoted firefighter-turned pastor, who started one of the first integrated churches in the American South.
The story of an affair between a bachelor junior minister in the French socialist government and a married right-wing business woman.
An independent producer unwisely opens a can of worms after he decides to make a movie about the unsolved murder of a famous silent film director in 1929.
The story of Swedish teenager Bert Ljung who has a big problem getting rid of his virginity.
This early 1960s film depicts the trivial pursuits and relationships of two college-age girls on a weekend vacation to a luxury resort in Puerto Rico.
A Teacher is murdered at an all girls school. Police investigate and discover that the staff room is full of suspects.

Insurance salesman Paul is to be engaged with Louise, the daughter of his boss. Trying to sell insurance to a millionaire he meet the millionaire's daughter Annette whom he fall in love with after some complications and funny business.

Intent on winning a competition in place of her distinguished late father, beautiful young heiress Dale takes on the guise of a man and competes in his spot, embarking on a car race that crosses the unforgiving Sahara desert.

movie_name: The Challenge of Flight - Go to Guns
description: This program traces the development of air combat from the use of air balloons to advanced weaponry of this era. See rare historic battle footage, cockpit views, battlefield action, bombs-eye-view in actual attacks, and more.
Reeling from his dismissal from a reality show, a deranged runner-up holds a group of co-eds hostage on the set of his own fictitious show, where losers suffer a deadly fate.
Two jilted women create a company to catch cheating men.
Told in four different New Year's Eves in the mid 1960s, John, Terry, Debbie, Steve and Laurie deal with adulthood, the Vietnam war, peace rallies, and relationships.
This is an experimental suspense thriller that has only 2 characters, 1 location, 1 rainy night and a risky bet that is too easy not to turn down.

A distress signal from a point near Jupiter takes the crew of the space-ship Starlight on a voyage through the sea of stars to a mysterious planet called Odin, the possible birthplace of the universe.
A detective chases pearl thieves to Newhaven and saves a girl from a warehouse fire.

A troubled teenager wants no one coming between her and her stepfather--which, unknown to him, is why she murdered her mother. Now "dad" has a new girlfriend, who has no idea how much trouble she will soon be in.

Karim is absolutely convinced he's an extraterrestrial. To find out more, he visits his Swiss mother. Here a mysterious soft drink bottle appears which turns into a spaceship. Karim hopes to find an answer in space ...
This cartoon gives advice to parents what type of toys to buy for their children.
A plane makes an emergency landing on a jungle island inhabited by a scientist and his three nubile young daughters. Complications ensue.
English version to release coming soon.
Set in Busan, South Korea during the 1970s, Lee Doo-sam builds an empire as a drug smuggler in the Busan underworld, while public prosecutor Kim In-goo attempts to take down Lee Doo-sam.
A college student locks horns with a dreaded gangster after getting to know that his friend was killed by the latter.

When a kid named Pannu finds a lantern in a cave, he opens it when he gets home and it releases the King of all Genies named Karkimuki. The genie helps the little boy with his problems of everyday life.
Nana, a gentle, beautiful young woman, escapes a violent anti-communist purge. Afterwards she lives comfortably as the second wife of a rich Sundanese man but her past re-emerges in her dreams.
Three best friends spy on their families, sneak into each other's house, and organize elaborate pranks.
Village bullies attempt to acquire lucrative land and engineer advantageous marital alliances, while the protagonists fight for love and honor.
A young man is trapped in a post-apocalyptic shack with his father. The radiation and atmospheric conditions of the world outside make them prisoners of their own home.
An original twist on an eternal triangle, where secret crush and unrequited love take on altogether newfangled meanings of their own.
A man hunts down buried treasure in the Australian outback from World War II with the help of an unlikely accomplice.
A policewoman has always had the worst luck in love. On a trip to Malaysia, she finally meets the man of her dreams. However, her Perfect Man might not be all he appears to be.

'IK WIST HET' is a magical feel-good film about an unorthodox young woman who opens up her own flower shop purely on intuition and meets the man she has -literally- always dreamed of.But then a new dream man presents itself.Who is the one?
Cristóbal (Miguel Ángel Rodríguez) a poor horse rancher has big ambitions and in exchange of money and power, is cursed, now by night he turns into a ferocious werewolf
An art student moves into a house owned by a mysterious woman. She discovers that her new artistic talent comes from beyond this world, revealing very deadly secrets about previous residents.
A man rescues a mysterious woman from the jungle.

movie_name: When Zachary Beaver Came to Town
description: Zachary Beaver, a sideshow attraction known as the world's fattest boy, arrives in the sleepy town of Granger, Texas.
Story of the Siberian monk Gregory Rasputin and the hold he exerted over the court of the last Russian czar, Nicholas.
The true story about a dog's loyalty to its master, even after his death.
A thief steals from the rich and gives it to poor.
Secrets is a gritty story filled with hope and the will to survive.
One night, a thief steals five chickens to sell it. This is a particular because those animals have an special component that will bring audacity to anyone who eats its flesh.

Set in college, Friendship is an emotional saga where two friends go out of their way to help a girl get justice, who is sexually abused and killed by goons. Will they succeed? After all, justice delayed is justice denied.
A clean cop gets assigned to a corrupt precinct, leaving him with two options: either give in or be next in line to have an "accident" wearing that badge.
In 1950s Canada, during a commercial flight, the pilots and some passengers suffer food poisoning, thus forcing an ex-WWII fighter pilot (Dana Andrews) to try to land the airliner in heavy fog.
A Professor and group of youngsters try to stop the theft of artefacts.
When a banker is threatened by extortionists, and his son is kidnapped, woman detective miss Clever goes undercover.
A bible sales man scours a local neighborhood in an attempt to cleanse the world of sin.
On August 31, 1969, in São Paulo, five militants from the armed left who were fighting the military dictatorship were arrested by Operation Bandeirantes (Oban).
Due to adversity, a dacoit helps poor people and he robbed rich and the crook who is very gentle and kind for public.
Safari guide (Baxter) is hired by the man (Lawson) who was responsible for his father's death.
When a family emergency forces a troubled teen to do the wrong thing for the right reason, a community discovers the meaning of forgiveness.
The destinies of different kind of people encounter in a passenger train that is traveling from Helsinki to the Norht.
A head of a factory starts using one of his female workers as a toy in more and more sadistic ways.
The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

movie_name: Terror of Prehistoric Bloody Monster from Space
description: When a paleontologist discovers dinosaur eggs, a mad scientist purchases the eggs with the intention of creating dinosaur / crocodile hybrids.
A love story between a professional thief and a prep student from a wealthy family.

A young woman in a decaying apartment complex finds herself seeing worms and moths everywhere, bursting out of beetles, animals, and people, and sets out to find how this is related to a rash of murders across the city.
A cop goes undercover in Thailand to avenge his brother's death in this martial arts film.

movie_name: Back to the 70's: Of Wine & Weed
description: Two friends struggle with life after college during the 1970's, until a wizard sends them to the future to face harsher challenges and try to find their way back to the 70's.

What happens when 8 reality show contestants and a small crew get stranded on a deserted island? At first it's all fun and games. But when one turns out to be a killer hellbent on revenge surviving the night seems less and less possible.
A father doesn't want his three daughters to get married. Now, it's up to three men to try to and convince the father that they're a good fit for his daughters.

A free-spirited young lady helps her high school best friend navigate from an accident that took away his mom and the colors in his vision, while also nursing her heart that has long harbored a deep feeling for him
A failed journalist accidentally saves a girl from suicide. She draws him into a strange game, the way out of which does not look unambiguous.
Realizing that they live independent lives when they complete their education and return to their homeland, Mehmet and Fatma decide to give their relationship a last chance.

In a near future the government decides to save money on psychiatric care. Josh, a mute war victim, is let out on the cold, gritty streets where he befriends the beautiful Maria who hides a horrible secret.

The Star Paws team is back and this time the entire galaxy is at stake! When an evil cat named Marlon Butterpaws makes plans to destroy the universe, it's up to an elite space dog team known as Star Paws to find and stop him.
The lives of two friends, who are passing through a bad phase, take a turn when they happen to befriend a genie.

movie_name: Monster High: Welcome to Monster High
description: When Dracula meets Frankie, they decide to create a school. But recruiting students always comes with its trials and tribulations.
At Helene Dragstrup's 20th birthday, her grandmother Margrethe decides that it is time that Helene learns something about life outside the protective walls of the estate.
A famous boxing champion is now retired and became a coach. But after a newcomer mutilates his ward, he decides to solve the riddle of his power.
A sexually-repressed girl of the Buenos Aires slums slowly goes mad after marrying.
A beetle is possessed by the soul of an ancient Egyptian princess, who is determined to get her revenge on a member of the British Parliament.

Two ex-lovers are at odds with one another during a weekend lake house party. As a killer in the woods picks off their friends one by one, they must decide whether to rekindle their flame or lose each other forever.

A criminally insane man is accidentally released from a mental hospital. The staff tries to cover it up, but a young psychiatrist travels to the college town where he committed several murders to warn the locals and anticipate his arrival.
A heartwarming family film about an engaged couple that adopts two puppies. When the couple splits up, the puppies hatch a plan to bring the two back together.
A British aircraft engineer accidentally kills his daughter's nasty foreign boyfriend, then tries to cover up his deed.
Running away from the Mongolian invasion, a young but highly devoted Anatolian scholar during the 13th Century embarks on a solo pilgrimage to find God in an allegory of the long lost love.
A love story told through the memories of two nameless lovers in different stages of their lives.

Transcendence offers insight into extreme sports psychology backed by the research of Dr. Eric Brymer. Follow the worlds most talented extreme sports athletes through in-depth personal accounts and breathtaking cinematography.

It tells the story of Romulus, his beautiful wife, Christina, and their struggle in the face of great adversity to bring up their son, Raimond. It is a story of impossible love that ultimately celebrates the unbreakable bond between father and son.
A criminal gang bust two of their incarcerated colleagues out of jail in order for them to take on a high profile drug smuggling operation.
Thee story of a broken family on their annual holiday to a bleak, lifeless, out-of-season Cornwall.
A girl from Paris' underworld fights for love and survival during a time of international turmoil.
The love life of a married couple becomes strictly routine and the husband takes his best friend advice and goes on a pilgrimage to see the all-knowing Maharaji.
The story of a drunken fighter (Sugawara) and an ailing, blind singer (Baisho) amid the power struggle between the Shogunate government and the Emperor in mid-19th century Japan.
A slide show of sci-fi space illustrations composed of slow dissolves and an equally futuristic and space-y music.
Two small-time thieves hatch a plan to get rich. They hire an automobile mechanic, with financial troubles, to help them in stealing cars.

Nico comes to Heide to study historical buildings. He meets the pretty city guide Heidi. During research in history, both discover clues to a hidden gold treasure, but draw the attention of a secret society, named "Westeregge".
A defiant cop must infiltrate a Colombian drug cartel and track down its bosses by being a vice agent known as 'The Fixer'.
Anthony hopes his basketball skills will get him into Cornell after high school. His only obstacle is his dad's gambling.
Panna Rittikrai stars as a man caught between corrupt police officers and vicious drug gangs.

A hot blooded gangster and his friends embark on a crime filled path to appease their thirst for wealth. On their crime littered journey, they face unexpected twists and events along the way makes them discover their true hidden selves.
The Love is Forever is a 2015 Indian romantic movie directed by Honey Vee starring Manoj Verma, Rana Jung Bahadur, Manoj Pandit, Manpreet Singh and Sonia Bindra, Viraat Attri as lead characters.

Two hit men who don't know each other end up trapped in a car for 24 hours parked in a Los Angeles street awaiting orders to kill a target. Both men will undergo a conscience check as well as human existence conflicts.
LGTBQ romantic love story set in the reality of Bear Week in Provincetown. Shot in the magical setting of summer in Cape Cod.
Three Horror stories with Bangkok as background.
A comedy based on the Ancient Rome with Christian De Sica, Massimo Boldi and Leslie Nielsen.
The owner of a plantation in the jungle marries a beautiful woman. Shortly afterward, he is plagued by a strange voodoo curse which transforms him into a gorilla.

movie_name: O Thanasis, i Ioulietta kai ta loukanika
description: Mad in love with a kind woman, a tireless locksmith has to deal with her rough three brothers and her butcher father, who want to marry her off to a sausage retailer. Will he summon up the courage to save his charming damsel in distress?
A gang of thieves plans to hit of a warehouse filled with precious stuff.
It is the summer of 1944 and two prisoners of war - a Lithuanian teacher and a Russian Navy officer - make an impulsive escape attempt and end up on a Baltic seaside resort for SS officers.
In Brussels, the corpses of young women were discovered buried behind the graves of collectors of paintings. Each of them lacks the right forearm.
A strained suburban family's Thanksgiving is disrupted by a gang of vicious vagrants.
A 17 year old couple loses their will to live after their world falls apart.

movie_name: Ecce Homo: Storia del passaggio di una sacra reliquia nel borgo degli Orci
description: Italy, 1536 d.C. Carlo II of Savoia, lord of Turin, has lost the war against Francesco I, king of France. He escape in a city far from home, Mantova - but during the trip, he arrives in a little town named Orci Novi.

A Rin-Tin-Tin serial presented in 12 episodes. The mysterious Wolf Man is terrorizing settlers in a western town. With the help of Rinty, young Jimmy Carter unmasks the Wolf Man and foils his evil plot.
As Kevin's life starts to crumble around him a new one opens up before him full of exotic drugs, double dealings, mysterious girls and fallen angels.
In a remote mountain village, Anna tries to preserve her young love for Marco, against all odds.
Takes you on a journey into the deep rooted intricacies of modern human relationships.
A group of people, living on the edge of society, try to survive on the streets of New York City in the shadow of the World Trade center in the early seventies.

A governor's son falls in love and marries a beautiful girl, the daughter of a courtesan. Their marriage is kept a secret from the governor who would immediately disown him if he found that his son married beneath him.
Jack Derry accidentally becomes involved in a mystery surrounding Glory Billings, when fate makes him her rescuer in a kidnapping episode.
Private detective Jess Arno and his real estate agent fiance June try to solve the murder when a tire magnate's body is found at a beach house.
A lesbian wanna-be model falls dangerously in love with an up and coming painter. The relationship goes too far too fast and the lines between art and sex get blurred.

Gothic lesbians prowl the corridors of a miserable little castle in Italy and fall prey to a deranged count with resplendent canine gnashers, a ghostly white complexion and the personality of Atilla the Hun.
An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.
Jamie is accused of a murder by society it's only a matter of time until Rosie can't take anymore of Jamie's excuses.

movie_name: Nachtwacht: De dag van de bloedmaan
description: Vlad, Keelin and Wilko find themselves in the world of werewolves. Here Wilko's father, Lupino, has united the wild werewolf clans in peace. Together with Wilko's sister Rhea, he wants to lead the werewolves into the modern age.
A Russian female vampire is on a mission of revenge in Rome's criminal underworld.
A review of Wigan's 2007/2008 season.
A couple attempts a high-risk, high-stakes jewelry heist at a department store.

Zaki is a simple poor man living with his little family. He got arrested by mistake for looking like a very dangerous criminal called Al Wahsh (The Beast). People started to fear and kneel for him while he's looking for the real Al Wahsh
Tia Madre is a horror film told by a hyper-imaginative 10-year old girl named Camille, whose mother transforms into something more sinister, violent, distant, and possibly not human.
Audrey is a high school girl who is used to getting what she wants. That is until a new substitute teacher shows up at her school. If she can't have him... No one can.
A singer becomes a star in the Ziegfeld Follies, but her marriage to a con man has a bad effect on her career.
Three friends in quest for a documentary production in a haunted jungle as part of a 'Adventure Competition'.
Colton, a respected sheriff's deputy, begins to question his faith in the shadow of his gunned down partner/ best friend. A grateful pastor helps to restore his fearless faith.
During WWII, husbandless New Zealand women meet and marry American soldiers who are fighting in the Pacific theater.
A mobster's wife hates her lifestyle, but gets a chance to change it when her husband is killed - if the Long Island mob and the FBI let her.
Leigh Parrish, a likeable, small-town girl, now famous actress, takes increasingly drastic steps to protect her fame.

Ester hides her identity to avoid being exposed to racism. When Ester suddenly finds herself in the middle of demonstrations against a big dam development in Alta, a personal journey out of the shame she has carried so long begins.

movie_name: I Am Corn Puffians: Ghost Camera
description: Through the entanglement of home videos, archival footage, and cinéma vérité, I Am Corn Puffians: Ghost Camera seizes 116 years of Toronto history to tell the tale of a documentarian's descent into artistic madness.
A failed gambler, intent on meeting a rich widow, tricks his widowed brother-in-law into boarding a cruise ship as dance hosts.

movie_name: Iyo ang Tondo kanya ang Cavite
description: TWO ACTION GIANTS OF LOCAL TEAM-UP TO DRAMATIZE TERRITORAL IMPERATIVES AMONG LOCAL KINGPINS.
A female superhero born with a curse to save the world.
Local criminals are earning their own piece of the pie in 2012, organ trafficking from the East End of London. When a returning son uncovers the theft of his Dad's heart, there is all hell to pay.
After a girl's wish for all animals to have the ability to speak comes true, local robbers try to capture her talking hedgehog.
A bitcoin heist connects four stories, each involving characters dealing with viral and social phenomena of a developing society.

Emma Warner, as a SVP of a toy company, spends 12 months a year focusing on Christmas, leaving no time for dating. This year, she plans a trip to a tropical singles resort, but a booking mistake takes her to a Christmas obsessed town.
A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.
The daughter of a wealthy real estate broker falls in love with a younger man, who introduces her to B&D and S&M. Using her newly awakened sexual prowess, she finally takes charge of her own life.

Side by Side explores, with refreshing honesty, the unique bond between a brother and a sister. Facing the rest of their childhood apart, they runaway in search of the only person who can keep their family together.

Tale of martial skill set in the Edo era, and completed with difficulty during the last months of WWII: the son of an archer ,who killed himself after losing a contest, takes up his father's former profession.
A woman coach inspires a teenage table tennis team.
Michele Ferretti is a small underworld boss in the Roman suburbs who must manage his uncle's empire as long as he is segregated under house arrest.

movie_name: The Prize Winner of Defiance, Ohio
description: In order to support her ten children, Evelyn Ryan enters a commercial jingle-writing contest.
A hit man is hired to kill a mob boss. After the deed is done, he and his driver are wanted dead by rival gangs who joined forces.
In England, an American car salesman ends-up spending a stormy night at the mysterious and deadly mansion of a client's family.
An insomniac man who lives in a sterile urban environment has a strange waking dream one night in which he experiences a surreal adventure incorporating wild nature and sexual freedom.
The Crime Doctor must prove the innocence of an artist accused of murdering his model during one of his blackout spells.

Lucky, owner of the Les Naturistes nightclub, is organizing bets for the Longchamp races. Max, the tipster, is shot by Bramati, Luky's ex-partner. The Judicial Police investigate and must deal with the case tactfully to find the killer
A story about a heroic fireman who worked as one of Chernobyl liquidators.
Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.
Five men go for the gold as members of Korea's national ski jumping team.
Rajan Zachariah, an Inspector of Police working in the Palakkad District on the Kerala-Karnataka border, investigates a murder case that is very important to him.
After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.
Racial tensions and corruption come to a head in a small, segregated town after the police find the body of a young Afrikaner girl in the bush.
After a one-night stand with a mysterious and beautiful woman, Jonathan falls ill and starts to believe that he's the victim of a sinister supernatural plot.
Members of the all-girl punk rock band "Kill, Pussy, Kill!" must fight for their lives and attempt to outwit an unknown assailant after finding themselves trapped in a madman's maze.

Michelle and Allen are in a relationship. They decide to invite their parents to finally meet about marriage. Turns out, the parents already know one another well, which leads to some differing opinions about marriage.
An engaged couple hit a number of speed bumps on their road to matrimony including major career complications and questions of fidelity.
Pippa and Glenn are done after 5 years of marriage, they both wan't to divorce but can't seem to agree on the devision of everything.
The survivor of a pistol duel is accidentally buried alive and must use all his wits to escape his prison.

A mother learns of a plot against the life of her son, a prosecuting attorney. She decides to take pre-emptive action and kills the would-be murderer. Now she finds herself facing charges of premeditated murder.
Recuperating from trauma, Jennifer remains in danger as she returns to a life she doesn't remember.
While conducting experiments to create "the perfect boobs" a group of doctors are transformed into Evil Mutant Creatures with an unstoppable hunger for BOOBS.

movie_name: The Story of Mary of Nazareth
description: What is really known about Jesus' mother? Does concrete historical proof exist of her life? Using theological, historical, literary, and archaeological sources, we will explore the fascinating universe that surrounds Mary of Nazareth.
Krishnashtami tells the story of an NRI who returns to India with a definite purpose. This romantic entertainer is told with large doses of comedy, romance and family values.
A promising MLB player is forced to return to his country after being found to be using steroids, and the only option he gets to rebuild his life is joining a team of losers in the Dominican league.
Teenage secret agents must travel to the past and stop an evil doctor from creating a virus that wipes out all life in the future.
A teen's life is turned upside down when he helps a world-famous pop star on the run to escape her violent pursuers.

In Dukun Doktor Dani, 34-year-old Taufik plays the titular character. After losing a patient during an operation, an emotionally-distressed Dani quits the medical profession and retreats to his hometown.
Obsessed with Pride and Prejudice (1995), a woman travels to a Jane Austen theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.
After the head of the corpse of a teenager she's restoring is stolen, an embalmer encounters the organ black market and a necrotomic religious cult.

movie_name: Kill the Fatted Calf and Roast It
description: When a young man named Enrico comes back home for his fathers funeral he discovers his brother Cesare and his sister Verde may be plotting his death.
After Park Man-su's wife asks for a divorce, the conservative salesman decides that he'll no longer play by the rules. Though a series of mishaps, Man-su becomes an unwitting fugitive from justice.
A dramatization of Christopher Columbus' voyage to the Americas.
After a performance at the Concert Mayol, a Parisian music hall, dancer Mado is poisoned with arsenic and transported to hospital, and survives. Immediately the rumors run behind the scene.
When a mother-in-law SCOLDS--that's ordinary, GOSSIPS--that's understandable, DESPAIRS--that's bearable. But when a mother-in-law just won't laugh--WHAT A MISFORTUNE.
A young teenage girl is horribly picked on at school and at home. She is befriended by a homicidal killer who teaches her how to get even with her enemies by using torture.
A crime syndicate abducts young women and forces them into pornography.
The movie revolves around Arunachalam (Rajini), who is the son of the VIP of a village who finds out about his past but destiny has its own play.

Eloïse is sitting alone on a bench in Paris. She can't remember who she is, where she comes from or how did she get here. So, she begins a funny investigation on her life. This amnesia might help her finding love and reinventing her life.
Romantic, small-town girl Holly and realist, career-driven Chris aren't a likely pair, but when "matched" together by Holly's all-knowing great-aunt, they don't have much of a choice.
Sahapadi 1975 is an interesting campus love story set against the backdrop of politics
A young Shanghai woman battles against the tyranny of her bullying father, with the help of a bookish neighbor.
An American adventurer goes to Tripoli to rescue some kidnapped sailors, but gets involved with a beautiful slave girl.

As a 'bin man' for a London crime syndicate, Jimmy Trueman used to dump bodies in the night. As a witness protection member, he now leads an average life as 'Frank Wallace'. But his bloody past is about to catch up with him.

When three children survive a bus crash that kills their parents, their childhood dies as well. Until they find an unlikely partner in grief at the shallow grave of a long lost child in the woods of a desolate park.
A mainland Chinese girl is, with her husband, a wanted criminal and they have to get to Hong Kong in order to stay alive and be free.
A shy young man attempts to buy ice cream for his girlfriend when faced by two of the town's worst bullies. This is the beginning of a day he will never forget.
Ukrainian folk tale. The hero of the story, Kotigoroschko sets off on an arduous journey to find his sister Olenka, who has been kidnapped by an evil dragon.

Faced with responsibility of bringing the beast responsible for the murders, with one single suspect, who pleads innocent, Dalwai finds himself leaving no stones unturned in cracking the most complicated case of his service.

An armoured car company is the target of repeated heists. Company leadership is enforcing new measures in order to tighten security. The biggest danger of a new heist lies from within the company's own ranks.

Ulkuthu is set in a small coastal town which is ruled by Kaka Mani (Sharath Lohitashwa) and his brother Saravanan (Dhilip Subbarayan), loansharks who deal in blood and blows when their debtors don't pay on time.
A man falls in love with his new neighbor but then finds that her family life is difficult.
A clash of two cultures, one primitive and the other exotic wild and cunning, but both of them with a violence and crime story, will face with each other in a house.
Kris and Preston team up once again to take on powerful gangster Buntao. But, Buntao has problems of his own, dealing with Dazo, another gangster who is on a steady rise to power.
Large-breasted private eye Busty Brown is hired to rescue a kidnapped Asian girl, so she gets a job at a sleazy nightclub where she believes the owner is involved in the kidnapping.
Coming of age story of four girls living in the same poor district of Warsaw just before the outbreak of World War One.
This story is about journey of a girl who was rejected by society and her family since birth and later how she turned out to be a boon for society and her family.

Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.
A group of teenagers are on holiday in the Aeolian islands.
Nachiket is single and peer pressure to be in a relationship drives him to do something risky. But, does it land him in trouble or does it change his life for good?
Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.
During the Vietnam War U.S. decoder Kate Meredith is plagued with guilt when her correspondent husband coerces her to pass information to him and the Viet Cong.
When a small town foul-mouthed drunk with an artistic gift for thievery is entrusted with his young niece for the summer, the question is not if he is ready for the task at hand-- but is she?
A wrongfully accused fugitive is chosen by the Angel of Death to become a Grim Reaper.
The untold story of Mexico's greatest and most beloved comedy film star of all time, from his humble origins on the small stage to the bright lights of Hollywood.

College student Ilya spends 7 years in prison on a fake drug bust. Coming out, he wants revenge on the dirty cop, Pyotr. He gets Pyotr's smartphone filled with personal info and starts texting - pretending to be Pyotr.
